comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: another bio is here: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=L000498 But this fellow does not seem to have been a judge. Perhaps its not the same fellow, see below. This article from NYTimes does mention a NYC judge by this name: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C00E3DD133BE6... And this article mentions a Supreme Court Justice in NY: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D04E6DA1138EE... Here Judge Luce is mentioned as being a candidate for the Supreme Court as proposed by Tammany Hall. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9400EFDE1E30E1...
